name: Not-so Adorable Home
description:
Martha, a housewife, is left alone at home to make sure that the house is clean, and in order. To keep her busy, she works on different chores.

As time passes by, she realizes that it is almost time before her children and husband get home. She has to prepare dinner for the family. However, she also realizes that she needs to find the necessary items to cook for dinner in her not-so-adorable home.
